languages.text: Контролируемое выжигание палуб — процесс трудоемкий, но хорошо известный пожарным служителям пустотного корабля. Эвакуированные отсеки были преданы огню, который выжег всю ересь и погань из самых темных уголков палуб. Твари из теней пропали бесследно, и обитатели охладительных систем вздохнули с облегчением.

The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.
languages.original_text: Контролируемое выжигание палуб — процесс трудоемкий, но хорошо известный пожарным служителям пустотного корабля. Эвакуированные отсеки были преданы огню, который выжег всю ересь и погань из самых темных уголков палуб. Твари из теней пропали бесследно, и обитатели охладительных систем вздохнули с облегчением.

traits.locale_text: The controlled scorching of decks is a labor intensive process that is nevertheless very familiar to the custodians of a void vessel. The evacuated chambers were set on fire that burned away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

The evacuated chambers were set on fire that burned away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

languages.text: 对控火大师手下的船员而言，尽管在舰船内部进行可控焚烧相当耗时耗力，但他们对整个流程非常熟悉。他们疏散了相关人员，将所有船舱点燃。烈焰烧尽了最黑暗的角落里的一切污秽和异端，躲藏在阴影中的猎手消失得无影无踪，负责冷却系统的船员也松了口气。
languages.original_text: The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

traits.locale_text: 对火控大师手下的船员而言，尽管在舰船内部进行可控焚烧相当耗时耗力，但他们对整个流程非常熟悉。他们疏散了相关人员，将所有船舱点燃。烈焰烧尽了最黑暗的角落里的一切污秽和异端，躲藏在阴影中的猎手消失得无影无踪，负责冷却系统的船员也松了口气。

languages.text: La quema controlada de las cubiertas es un proceso laborioso pero muy conocido para los soldados del vacío que sirven bajo las órdenes del Maestro Infernus de la nave. Se prendió fuego a las cámaras evacuadas, quemando toda la suciedad y la herejía de los rincones más oscuros. Los acechadores de las sombras desaparecieron sin dejar rastro y la gente de los sistemas de refrigeración respiró aliviada.
languages.original_text: The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

traits.locale_text: La quema controlada de las cubiertas es un proceso laborioso pero muy conocido para los soldados del vacío que sirven bajo las órdenes del Maestro Infernus de la nave. Se prendió fuego a las cámaras evacuadas, quemando toda la suciedad y la herejía de los rincones más oscuros. Los acechadores de las sombras desaparecieron sin dejar rastro y la gente de los sistemas de refrigeración respiró aliviada.

languages.text: デッキで炎を扱うとなるとかなりの人手が必要だが、船のインフェルヌス・マスターに仕えるヴォイズマンにとっては日常茶飯事だ。どこかへ人を避難させた部屋に火を放って、特別暗い隅からすべての汚物と異端を燃やし尽くす。影に潜むものは跡形もなく消えて、冷却システムの住人はホッとため息をついた。
languages.original_text: The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

traits.locale_text: デッキで炎を扱うとなるとかなりの人手が必要だが、船のインフェルヌス・マスターに仕えるヴォイズマンにとっては日常茶飯事だ。どこかへ人を避難させた部屋に火を放って、特別暗い隅からすべての汚物と異端を燃やし尽くす。影に潜むものは跡形もなく消えて、冷却システムの住人はホッとため息をついた。

languages.text: L'incinération contrôlée des ponts est une tâche laborieuse, mais routinière pour les cosmomarins sous les ordres du maître-infernus. Les salles sont évacuées et incinérées, vaporisant toute forme d'immondice et d'hérésie tapie dans les recoins les plus sombres. Les rôdeurs de l'ombre disparaissent sans laisser de traces, et le personnel chargé des systèmes de refroidissement est plus que soulagé de pouvoir reprendre son travail sereinement.
languages.original_text: The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

traits.locale_text: L'incinération contrôlée des ponts est une tâche laborieuse, mais routinière pour les cosmomarins sous les ordres du maître-infernus. Les salles sont évacuées et incinérées, vaporisant toute forme d'immondice et d'hérésie tapie dans les recoins les plus sombres. Les rôdeurs de l'ombre disparaissent sans laisser de traces, et le personnel chargé des systèmes de refroidissement est plus que soulagé de pouvoir reprendre son travail sereinement.

languages.text: Das kontrollierte Verbrennen von Decks ist ein arbeitsintensiver, aber vertrauter Prozess für die Raumfahrer, die unter dem Infernus-Meister des Schiffs dienen. Die evakuierten Kammern wurden in Brand gesetzt, um sämtlichen Schmutz und sämtliche Ketzerei in den hintersten Winkeln zu verbrennen. Die Schattenkreaturen sind spurlos verschwunden, die Bewohner der Kühlsysteme konnten erleichtert aufatmen.

The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.

traits.locale_text: Das kontrollierte Verbrennen von Decks ist ein arbeitsintensiver, aber vertrauter Prozess für die Raumfahrer, die unter dem Infernus-Meister des Schiffs dienen. Die evakuierten Kammern wurden in Brand gesetzt, um sämtlichen Schmutz und sämtliche Ketzerei in den hintersten Winkeln zu verbrennen. Die Schattenkreaturen sind spurlos verschwunden, die Bewohner der Kühlsysteme konnten erleichtert aufatmen.

languages.text: Güvertelerin kontrollü olarak yakılması, geminin İtfa Üstadı'nın komutası altında görev yapan uçsuz erleri için uğraştırıcı ancak bilindik bir süreç oldu. Tahliye edilen bölmeler ateşe verildi, en karanlık köşelerdeki her türlü pislik ve sapkınlık yok edildi. Gölgelerde gizlenen yaratıklar iz bırakmadan kayboldu ve soğutma sistemleri sakinleri rahat bir nefes aldı.
languages.original_text: The controlled scorching of decks is a labour-intensive but very familiar process for the voidsmen serving under the ship's Infernus Master. The evacuated chambers were set on fire, burning away all filth and heresy from the darkest corners. The shadow-skulkers vanished without a trace, and the denizens of the cooling systems breathed a sigh of relief.
